description_html: Paradiso is an ikat-inspired sumptuous, velvety fabric. The archetypal pattern has been stepped up a notch, utilizing saturated yarns in carefully calibrated hues. The result is a spectacular pattern that will make a statement wherever it is used. The fabric is made of 100% solution dyed polyolefin and is fade, stain, UV, and mildew resistant. At 50,000 double rubs, this durable, woven fabric can be utilized for residential, hospitality or commercial applications indoors or out.
